pipelet-node.description: Sets a special reporting marker to indicate a successful registration. This flag will later be evaluate in the template and reset to avoid double reporting of a registration.

text-node.description: Updates the profile of an authenticated customer.
Renders the password reset screen. This is very similar to the password reset dialog but has screen-based interaction instead of popup interaction.
Renders the screen for setting a new password. If token not valid, just quietly forward to PasswordReset screen.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Validate token before even coming to page.

text-node.description: Start the customer registration process and displays the account overview upon a successful registration.
ValidateAge script validates age of the customer.
PasswordMatch=0 Means Confirm Password & New password field value matches. PasswordMatch=1 Means Password is not reset.Other details are updated
Store entered email address as login and email.
Update profile details as entered by customer
Checks the given user name on existence and ends on a named end node to communicated the status back.
Ajax call to handle update of Customer first and last name.
